attributes.action: Stop our small bonuses becoming a bonus for the government
attributes.additional_details:
Why should the government be rewarded for our hard work? We work hard and are sometimes rewarded with a small bonus, so why should the government take so much of it in taxes? We are the one's doing the work and our employers are trying to reward us for doing so, unfortunately 33 % of our bonus ends up going to the government as tax and NI, what have they done to earn it?
We earn it, so let us keep more of it!!
